InvoiceForm.title: Invoice Split Calculator
InvoiceForm.description_p1: Split invoices across fiscal years. Stay compliant with IFRS, HGB, and OR — no login, no data storage. Simple, fast, precise.
InvoiceForm.description_p2: Ideal for accountants preparing income statements and balance sheets, financial professionals managing budgets, or anyone needing a clear financial breakdown for reporting.
InvoiceForm.includeEndDateLabel: Include Final Day in Service Period?
InvoiceForm.includeEndDateDescription: Check if the final day should be included in the service period calculation.
InvoiceForm.includeEndDateTooltip: If checked, the end date is included in the allocation period (+1 day). Example: Jan 1 to Jan 3 (inclusive) = 3 days.
InvoiceForm.amountsDescription: Enter one or more amounts to allocate.
InvoiceForm.errorEndDateBeforeStart: End date must be on or after start date.
InvoiceForm.errorAmountRequired: Please enter at least one amount.
InvoiceForm.errorAmountPositive: Amount must be a positive number.
InvoiceForm.amountHelper: Enter the total invoice amount for the service period.

ResultsDisplay.roundingNote: Note: Totals may vary slightly due to rounding.
ResultsDisplay.errorNoSplits: Calculation complete, but no allocation results generated.
ResultsDisplay.successMessage: Split completed successfully! Your detailed allocation is ready.

SettingsModal.title: Number Formatting
SettingsModal.settingsModalDescription: Customize your preferred number format for allocations and reports.
SettingsModal.decimalPlacesDescription: Set how many decimal places to display in results.
SettingsModal.roundingPrecisionDescription: Specify the nearest rounding step (e.g. 0.01 for cents).
SettingsModal.useThousandsSeparatorDescription: Add separators in large numbers to improve readability.
SettingsModal.thousandsSeparatorDescription: Choose the separator style for numbers.
